CHANGES
=======

1.18.1 (2018-09-01)
-------------------

- Improve support for special characters

1.18.0 (2018-08-14)
-------------------

- Add **CHANGES.rst** to track further changes
- Add tests
- Use `git check-attr` to test against export-ignore
- Better support for unicode file names
- Require Git >= 1.6.1
